listData.name: Budget Home Loan
listData.description: A low cost home loan option, the Budget Home Loan has a discount off IMB’s standard variable rate for the life of the loan, so you’ll always pay less. No monthly fees, unrestricted additional repayments and free Internet and Mobile Banking redraw

features.additionalInfo: Internet Banking and Mobile Banking App.

IMB Alerts keep you up to date by sending you SMS or email alerts regarding your banking. Account Alerts help you keep track of your finances and Internet Banking Security Alerts to help keep you safe online. You can register for Alerts in Internet Banking.
Direct Credit is available on this account type.
Receive Electronic Funds Transfers (EFT) to this account type.
IMB boasts an extensive branch network throughout the Illawarra, Sydney, NSW South Coast, the ACT and Melbourne.
IMB consultants are available Monday to Friday 8am - 8pm and Saturday 9am - 4pm
Receive only
Split loan available.
Free redraw via internet and mobile banking
Unrestricted additional repayments

A Family Guarantee allows family to assist their children in the purchase of a property without actually providing a cash gift or cash loan. It could also allow borrowers to include some of the costs of purchasing, such as stamp duty and legal costs in the loan amount.
Enjoy up to $4,000 cashback for new purchase or refinance home loans. Min loan size $250,000 and Max LVR 80%. Lending and eligibility criteria, T&Cs apply.

constraints.additionalInfo: Up to 95% loan to value ratio (LVR)

eligibility.additionalValue: NULL
Borrowers must be Australian Citizens or permanent residents.
Assessment
eligibility.additionalInfo: Lending Criteria apply

eligibility.additionalValue: Purpose of funds
eligibility.additionalInfo: For new funds only. Not available as a switch or re-finance from another IMB home loan

fees.name: Loan Application Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Application fee includes one valuation. Valuation costs over & above single/primary security are to be covered by the borrower. Other fees and charges may apply.

fees.name: Additional Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If the loan is to be against more than one security, additional valuation costs will be collected at settlement.

fees.name: Redraw Fee (free via internet and mobile banking)
fees.additionalInfo: Redraws are FREE via internet banking, otherwise a fee applies

fees.name: Split Loan Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable to IMB if a loan is split into more than one account.

fees.name: Other fees and charges may apply.
fees.additionalInfo: A full list of fees and charges will be provided if loan is approved.

fees.name: PEXA Transaction Service Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable to the Property Exchange Australia for electronic lodgement of any transaction on title after settlement, including lodgement or discharge of mortgage or caveat.

fees.name: Additional Mortgage Processing Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each additional new security property and added to the Mortgage Processing Fee.

fees.name: Amendment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when contract documentation is re-issued due to a change requested by a borrower.

fees.name: Guarantor Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for the preparation and processing of guarantee documentation when a loan includes a guarantor/s.

fees.name: Construction Loan Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for the processing of progress payment requests on a construction loan, including any valuer progress inspection reports we may require.

fees.name: Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when a non-standard valuation is required. A non-standard valuation may be required when the estimated value of a security property is above a certain amount, or a security property is of a certain type (e.g. a rural or heritage property).

fees.name: Additional Loan Application Fee/Top-up Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for an application for an additional loan with no new security.

fees.name: Consent Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable each time we are asked to consent to a request that affects the security property (e.g. a subsequent mortgage, lease, subdivision or transfer).

fees.name: Default Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when a loan is in default because amounts due have not been paid on time.

fees.name: Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if a payment made in or out of a loan account is dishonoured.

fees.name: Discharge Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable each time we release and discharge a security property.

fees.name: Partial Discharge Processing Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we are asked to release a security property from a loan which has more than one security property. This fee covers the processing of this request and is payable in addition to the Discharge Fee and any other fees and charges that may apply.

fees.name: Portable Loan Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we are asked to replace an existing security property with a new security property.

fees.name: Switching Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we process a request to change to an interest rate type, product type or repayment type, including extending an interest only period and at the end of a fixed rate term.

lendingRates.additionalInfo:
Interest rates are based on criteria that includes purpose (owner occupier or investment), repayment type (principal and interest (P&I) or interest only) and loan to value ratio (LVR). Different interest rates and establishment fees may apply if the purpose, repayment type or LVR is different to the purpose, repayment type or LVR for the interest rate shown.

fees.additionalInfo: Payable each time we release and discharge a security property.

fees.name: Partial Discharge Processing Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we are asked to release a security property from a loan which has more than one security property. This fee covers the processing of this request and is payable in addition to the Discharge Fee and any other fees and charges that may apply.

fees.name: Portable Loan Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we are asked to replace an existing security property with a new security property.

fees.name: Switching Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we process a request to change to an interest rate type, product type or repayment type, including extending an interest only period and at the end of a fixed rate term.

fees.name: Break Costs
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on a fixed rate loan if the loan is repaid or switched before the end of the fixed rate period.

fees.name: Advance Repayment Costs
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on a fixed rate loan if extra loan repayments are more than 12 times the monthly repayment during the fixed rate period.

Internet Banking and Mobile Banking App.
Create a PayID through IMB’s Internet Banking or Mobile Banking App to receive Osko payments.

This account type is enabled for Osko payments, via the New Payments Platform (NPP). Osko is the faster way to pay or receive money from friends, family and businesses. No more waiting days for money to change hands. Now you can pay and be paid in a matter of seconds
BPAY® is an electronic bill payment service, providing a convenient access point for the payment and receipt of consumer bills.

IMB Alerts keep you up to date by sending you SMS or email alerts regarding your banking. Account Alerts help you keep track of your finances and Internet Banking Security Alerts to help keep you safe online. You can register for Alerts in Internet Banking.
Direct debit is available on this account type.
Direct Credit is available on this account type.
Schedule Electronic Funds Transfers or Periodic Payments via internet banking, in branch or telephone banking
Make and receive Electronic Funds Transfers (EFT) from this account type.
Do your day to day banking with your IMB transaction account at Australia Post Offices where Bank@Post is available.
IMB boasts an extensive branch network throughout the Illawarra, Sydney, NSW South Coast, the ACT and Melbourne.
IMB consultants are available Monday to Friday 8am - 8pm and Saturday 9am - 4pm
As of 1 June 2021, IMB will not offer a cheque facility to customers that become Members on or after that date, or to existing Members who have not been issued a cheque facility before that date

depositRates.additionalValue: The Kick Start Bonus Interest Rate is a variable interest rate payable for the duration the account is eligible: - Reward Saver Kick Start account for account holders aged under 18 years of age; or - Until 31/03/2024 for Reward Saver Kick Start accounts for Students, apprentices and trainees aged under 30. For Reward Saver Kick Start accounts opened prior to 1 September 2021., the Fixed Bonus Interest Rate continues to apply. Can be converted to the Kick Start Bonus Interest Rate on request. The Fixed Bonus Interest Rate is payable on balances from $0-$4999 at 1.00% p.a. Bonus interest criteria applies.

The Kick Start Bonus Interest Rate is a variable interest rate payable for the duration the account is eligible: - Reward Saver Kick Start account for account holders aged under 18 years of age; or - Until 31/03/2024 for Reward Saver Kick Start accounts for Students, apprentices and trainees aged under 30. For Reward Saver Kick Start accounts opened prior to 1 September 2021., the Fixed Bonus Interest Rate continues to apply. Can be converted to the Kick Start Bonus Interest Rate on request. The Fixed Bonus Interest Rate is payable on balances from $0-$4999 at 1.00% p.a. Bonus interest criteria applies.

Standard Variable Bonus Interest Rate. To earn bonus interest the account holder must make a minimum $20 deposit and no withdrawals per month. If bonus interest criteria are not met for the calendar month, both the Standard Variable Bonus Interest and Fixed Bonus Interest Rate are forfeited.

Standard Variable Bonus Interest Rate. To earn bonus interest the account holder must make a minimum $20 deposit and no withdrawals per month. If bonus interest criteria are not met for the calendar month, both the Standard Variable Bonus Interest and Kick Start Bonus Interest Rate are forfeited.

Internet Banking and Mobile Banking App.

BPAY® is an electronic bill payment service, providing a convenient access point for the payment and receipt of consumer bills.

IMB Alerts keep you up to date by sending you SMS or email alerts regarding your banking. Account Alerts help you keep track of your finances and Internet Banking Security Alerts to help keep you safe online. You can register for Alerts in Internet Banking.

IMB consultants are available Monday to Friday 8am - 8pm and Saturday 9am - 4pm

detailData.name: Everyday Account
detailData.description: The IMB Everyday Account comes with a great range of access options and no monthly account keeping fee, you'll just pay for the transactions you do.
